0.text: Innate: Teemo gains  invisibility after 1.5 seconds of not moving, taking damage, performing actions that break stealth,  channeling, and being in  stasis. Teemo will remain invisible so long as he does not move or act, and is not  displaced. If within  brush, Teemo gains invisibility after 1.5 seconds even while moving and may do so freely within its boundaries without breaking stealth.

1.text: Innate - Element of Surprise: When Teemo breaks stealth, he gains the Element of Surprise for 5 seconds, granting him  20 / 40 / 60 / 80% (based on level) bonus attack speed.

0.text: Active: Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage and  blinds them for a few seconds.

1.text: The duration of the  blind is doubled against  minions and  monsters.

0.text: Passive: Teemo gains  bonus movement speed if he hasn't taken damage from enemy  champions or  turrets for 5 seconds.

1.text: Active: Teemo doubles the bonus movement speed gained from Move Quick's passive for 3 seconds and prevents it from being lost by damage for the duration.

2.text: Casting Move Quick does not break  Guerrilla Warfare's stealth nor reset its fade into it.

0.text: Passive: Teemo's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit and apply a toxin for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every second over the duration, during which the target is also inflicted with  poison. Subsequent attacks refresh the poison's duration.

1.text: Toxic Shot deals 150% damage against  monsters.

0.text: Passive: Teemo stores a Noxious Trap charge periodically, up to a maximum amount at once.

1.text: Active: Teemo tosses a poisonous mushroom at the target location which, upon landing, becomes  stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 5 minutes and granting  sight of its surroundings. Noxious Trap bounces forward if it lands on top of another.

2.text: The mushroom will explode upon enemy contact, dealing magic damage every second over 4 seconds to all nearby enemies, during which the targets are also  revealed and inflicted with  poison, and  slowing them for 4 seconds.

3.text: Noxious Traps have  6 maximum health and can only be damaged by  champion basic attacks (2 damage from  ranged and 3 from  melee).

1.concerningText: Active: Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage and  blinds them for a few seconds.
The duration of the  blind is doubled against  minions and  monsters.

2.concerningText: Passive: Teemo gains  bonus movement speed if he hasn't taken damage from enemy  champions or  turrets for 5 seconds.

Toxic Shot deals 150% damage against  monsters.

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 15 (+ 1.5% AP) (+ 1% target's maximum health) magic damage every second for 4 seconds. 」

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
